trans-unit.source: Represents a row header of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
The row status images (pencil, asterisk, and arrow) are resized according to the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry:
trans-unit.target: 행 상태 이미지 (연필, 별표 및 화살표) app.config 파일에 다음 항목이 포함 되어 있으면 시스템 DPI 설정에 따라 크기가 조정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: When you derive from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell" /> and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.Clone" /> method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.
trans-unit.target: 파생 시키는 경우 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell" /> 파생 된 클래스에 새 속성을 추가 하 고, 재정의 해야는 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.Clone" /> 복제 작업 중 새 속성을 복사 하려면.

trans-unit.source: You should also call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.Clone" /> method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.
trans-unit.target: 또한 기본 클래스를 호출 해야 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.Clone" /> 메서드는 기본 클래스의 속성이 새로운 셀에 복사 되도록 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell" /> class.
Creates an exact copy of this cell.
trans-unit.target: 이 셀과 정확하게 일치하는 복사본을 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the cloned <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell" />.
Creates a new accessible object for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell" />에 대해 액세스 가능한 개체를 새로 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.DataGridViewRowHeaderCellAccessibleObject" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell" />.

If you do not explicitly call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> 메서드를 명시적으로 호출하지 않으면 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A> 속성을 참조할 때 이 메서드가 호출됩니다.

trans-unit.source: To get or set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나 설정할 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>에 대 한 참조를 추가 해야 합니다는 `Accessibility` 어셈블리는.NET Framework와 함께 설치 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 해당 셀을 포함하는 행의 0부터 시작하는 인덱스입니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the cell is in the first column of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 셀이 선택한 셀에서 정의한 영역의 첫 번째 열에 있으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the cell is the last column of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 셀이 선택한 셀에서 정의한 영역의 마지막 열에 있으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the cell is in the first row of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 셀이 선택한 셀에서 정의한 영역의 첫 번째 행에 있으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the cell is in the last row of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 선택한 셀에 정의된 영역의 마지막 행에 해당 셀이 있음을 나타내려면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The current format string of the cell.
Retrieves the formatted value of the cell to copy to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard" />.
trans-unit.target: 서식이 지정된 셀 값을 검색하여 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard" />에 복사합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the value of the cell to copy to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />에 복사할 셀 값을 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClipboardCopyMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, this method is called by the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A> method to retrieve a clipboard-formatted value that represents the cell.
trans-unit.target: 값에 따라는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClipboardCopyMode%2A> 의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> 컨트롤,이 메서드는 컨트롤의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A> 셀을 나타내는 클립보드 형식의 값을 검색 하는 메서드.

trans-unit.source: The position-related parameters of this method indicate where this cell is located in the table of data representing the region defined by the selected cells in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드의 매개 변수 위치에 관련 된이 셀을 선택한 셀에 의해 정의 된 영역을 나타내는 데이터의 테이블에 있는 위치를 나타내는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the cell's position, formatting information may be returned by this method in addition to the cell value.
trans-unit.target: 셀의 위치에 따라 서식 정보 수 반환할 셀 값 외에도이 메서드에 의해입니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, the HTML format for a cell in the first column of a row will include the tag that indicates the beginning of a row.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 행의 첫 번째 열에 셀에 대 한 HTML 형식에는 행의 시작 부분을 나타내는 태그가 포함 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The supported clipboard formats include <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class.
<paramref name="rowIndex" /> is less than zero or greater than or equal to the number of rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rowIndex" />가 0보다 작거나 컨트롤의 행 수보다 크거나 같은 경우

trans-unit.source: The graphics context for the cell.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> to be applied to the cell.
The index of the cell's parent row.
Returns the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's content area, which is calculated using the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> and cell style.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />와 셀 스타일을 사용하여 계산된 셀의 내용 영역을 둘러싸는 경계 사각형을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that bounds the cell's contents.
The graphics context for the cell.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> to be applied to the cell.
The index of the cell's parent row.
Returns the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's error icon, if one is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 셀의 오류 아이콘이 표시되면 이 아이콘을 둘러싸는 경계 사각형을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that bounds the cell's error icon, if one is displayed; otherwise, <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 셀의 오류 아이콘이 표시되면 이 아이콘을 바인딩하는 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell.
Returns a string that represents the error for the cell.
A string that describes the error for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
The index of the row to get the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip" /> of.
The index must be -1 to indicate the row of column headers.
trans-unit.target: 열 머리글의 행을 나타내려면 인덱스가 -1이어야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the inherited shortcut menu for the specified row.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 행에 대한 상속된 바로 가기 메뉴를 검색합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip" /> of the row if one exists; otherwise, the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip" /> inherited from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 행의 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip" />이 있으면 해당 스트립을 반환하고, 그렇지 않으면 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip" />에서 상속한 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView" /> property of the cell is not <see langword="null" /> and the specified <paramref name="rowIndex" /> is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: 셀의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView" /> 속성 값이 <see langword="null" />이 아니고 지정된 <paramref name="rowIndex" />가 0보다 작거나 열의 행 수 - 1보다 큰 경우

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> to be populated with the inherited cell style.
The index of the cell's parent row.
<see langword="true" /> to include inherited colors in the returned cell style; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 반환되는 셀 스타일에 상속된 색을 포함하려면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the style applied to the cell.

A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> that includes the style settings of the cell inherited from the cell's parent row, column, and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 셀의 부모 행, 열 및 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" />에서 상속된 셀의 스타일 설정을 포함하는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the cell.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> that represents the style of the cell.
The zero-based row index of the cell.
The cell's maximum allowable size.
Calculates the preferred size, in pixels, of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 셀의 기본 크기를 픽셀 단위로 계산합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the preferred size, in pixels, of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 셀의 기본 크기를 픽셀 단위로 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
Gets the value of the cell.
The value contained in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell" />.
A `rowIndex` value of -1 indicates a shared row.

The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView" /> property of the cell is not <see langword="null" /> and <paramref name="rowIndex" /> is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of rows in the parent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 셀의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView" /> 속성 값이 <see langword="null" />이 아니고 <paramref name="rowIndex" />가 -1보다 작거나 부모 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />의 행 수보다 크거나 같은 경우

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to paint the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: 다시 그려져야 하는 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />의 영역을 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that contains the bounds of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> that is being painted.
The row index of the cell that is being painted.
A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values that specifies the state of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 셀의 상태를 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> 값의 비트 조합입니다.

trans-unit.source: The data of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> that is being painted.
The formatted data of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> that is being painted.
An error message that is associated with the cell.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> that contains formatting and style information about the cell.
trans-unit.target: 셀에 대한 형식 및 스타일 정보를 포함하는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> that contains border styles for the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: 그리고 있는 셀에 대한 테두리 스타일을 포함하는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts" /> values that specifies which parts of the cell need to be painted.
trans-unit.target: 그릴 셀의 부분을 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts" /> 값의 비트 조합입니다.

trans-unit.source: Paints the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell" />.
The index of the cell's parent row.
The cell value to set.
Sets the value of the cell.
<see langword="true" /> if the value has been set; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 값이 설정되었으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of the cell.
A string that represents the current cell.
